title: Premier Hockey Federation Gets Massive $25M Investment
itunes:title: Premier Hockey Federation Gets Massive $25M Investment
description:
The Premier Hockey Federation has announced a commitment from the Board of Governors to invest over $25 million in direct payments and benefits to its players over the next three years. Join Michael Barr, Scarlet Fu, and Mike Lynch as they discuss the implications for women's hockey in North America, the 'Joker'-less Australian Open, and more... On this Wednesday edition of Bloomberg Business of Sports.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
